step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your shoulders relaxed as you begin the roll.
Nice movement! Focus on squeezing your shoulder blades together and down.
Great job on the first rep! Remember to breathe deeply as you roll back.
Second rep starting well. Ensure a smooth, controlled motion.
Excellent! Continue to focus on the circular motion, bringing shoulders down.
Fantastic finish! You're doing great with shoulder mobility and lymphatic flow.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with your shoulder rolls! Remember to keep the motion smooth and controlled, squeezing your shoulder blades back and down. Deep breaths during the backward roll will help with oxygen flow and lymphatic movement. Keep up the excellent work!
